programmes.show_description: Discover Electric Ink Designs' unique digital downloads of stylish and edgy art stamps designed by Carley Duff. Perfect for a range of craft projects.
Take cardmaking to new heights with the Floral Awakenings Decoupage Toppers. The designs cover a host of themes allowing you to create stunning dimensional cards with ease.
Mark is back with his latest collection, Grunge Florals! Packed with cardmaking, mixed media, art journalling and scrapbooking inspiration in his signature grunge style.
Discover Electric Ink Designs' unique digital downloads of stylish and edgy art stamps designed by Carley Duff. Perfect for a range of craft projects.
Transform your crafts with Hunkydory, where beautiful designs and premium materials come together to inspire your most creative projects yet!
HobbyMaker Repeats.
HobbyMaker Repeats.
HobbyMaker Repeats.
Celebrate the season with fresh, cheerful fabrics inspired by Easter and springtime. Featuring soft pastels, playful bunnies, eggs, florals and charming novelty prints.
Hayley West joins us for an hour of makes!
Equip your creative space with the essential tools that make every project smoother, more accurate, and more enjoyable, from cutting and measuring to pressing and finishing.
Hayley West brings us an hour of Easter makes!
Finishing the show today with an hour of makes perfect for gifting - to someone special, or to yourself!
Add a touch of floral elegance to your crafts with the new Painted Petals paper pad. Plus new Celebration & Essential Dies, perfect for adding focal points and decorative elements.
Discover the calming beauty of Sanntangle - mesmerising designs that grow with every line and bring focus to your creative flow.
Cathie and Mel bring you their beautifully crafted, hand-drawn stamps featuring Miranda Panda and Griffaric Jam, along with stencils including Gentle Giraffe and Whispering Bamboo.
From classic cards to customised keepsakes, the new DL Aperture Dies Collection opens so many papercraft styles. Plus, don't miss the Back-in-Stock Cordless Glue Gun!
Cathie and Mel bring you their beautifully crafted, hand-drawn stamps featuring Miranda Panda and Griffaric Jam, along with stencils including Gentle Giraffe and Whispering Bamboo.
Discover the calming beauty of Sanntangle - mesmerising designs that grow with every line and bring focus to your creative flow.
Give messages of love, care, and celebration a personal touch with the Hands and Banners Celebration Stamp & Metal Die Set.
Dive into the vibrant and mesmerising world of Encaustic Art, where wax and colour unite to create captivating masterpieces.

Join us for an hour and a half with Jenny Jackson.
Equip your creative space with the essential tools that make every project smoother, more accurate, and more enjoyable, from cutting and measuring to pressing and finishing.
Rachel Bath brings us an hour of 3D Easter Felting kits, and more!
Finishing the show today with an hour of makes perfect for gifting - to someone special, or to yourself!
Join Sharon for the release of the New Spring Pouch, A6 Stamp Sets featuring You Mean So Mush. Plus, discover the brand-new die sets, including Tatty Circles and Squares.
Expand your cosy designs with this Spring Felt Collection. Perfect for home décor, tags or cards! These felty friends bring the warm fuzzies to anyone who receives them.
Join us in welcoming Claina Palmer Designs to the HobbyMaker Family, bringing SVG sized projects to crafters who love to die cut. Discover how you can create unique 3D projects.
From the Art World to the Craft World, Leonie returns with a stunning collection of stamp sets, stencils, and more, designed to inspire your next creative project.
